questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates explore an island shaped like a drum and encounter a reindeer doctor. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive on a mysterious island governed by strict time rules and encounter the Foxy Pirates. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a musician known for his long nose and ability to create powerful sound-based attacks. Who is...?
